sentences.sContent: Nothing like that has happened in Europe — yet. But it’s certainly within the realm of possibility, especially as the pain of austerity and internal devaluation drags on.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nothing like that has happened in Europe — yet. But it’s certainly within the realm of possibility, especially as the pain of austerity and internal devaluation drags on.
sentences.sCn: 在欧洲还没有发生这样的事情，但肯定在可能性范畴之内，尤其是随着财政紧缩与内部贬值痛苦的持续，这种可能会增大。

sentences.sContent: The risk of devaluation (of the currency) does not affect them as much as it does other investors.
sentences.sContent_eng: The risk of devaluation (of the currency) does not affect them as much as it does other investors.
sentences.sCn: （货币）贬值风险对他们的影响不像对其他投资商那么大。

words.tran: 使…贬值；降低…的价值；减少…的重要性
